inclusion.criterion: Korean asthma patients age ≥ 19 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have moderate to severe persistent asthma, as defined by GINA 2018 guideline, with ICS/LABA DPI use history
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have uncontrolled asthma in FEV1 up to 60% and Asthma control test score < 20
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female subjects of child bearing potential must have a negative urine pregnancy test prior to first dose of study medication and that they must be agree to use adequate contraception during the study period
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who are able to use the inhaler
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who is willing to voluntarily sign the study consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current and past smoker: Smoker defined as below
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current smoker: smoking history within 90 days prior to screening
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Past smoker: smoking amount >10 pack year
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 39-year-old man with cough and shortness of breath, history of asthma for 3 years. FEV1 of 63%.
